title: Flash Gatsby
alt: Protip: At midnight your excuse for not having read The Great Gatsby can switch from "I'm worried about violating copyright" to "I think my copy requires Flash."
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting at a desk using his laptop.]
Off-panel voice: 3... 2... 1... Happy New Year!
Cueball: Okay, it’s up!
Cueball: Annnnnd ... support was pulled, it’s down again.[Caption below the panel:]
There's only a very short window of time in which I can post my unauthorized Flash® adaptation of The Great Gatsby.
